subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Oliver Purnell was warned about coaching Clemson, a woeful basketball team five years ago. But he’s pulled them up, and this week they enter the A.C.C. tournament as the No. 3 seed.
snippet: Oliver Purnell was warned about coaching Clemson, a woeful basketball team five years ago. But he’s pulled them up, and this week they enter the A.C.C. tournament as the No. 3 seed.
